name: golem-forge-monorepo
description: Golem Forge monorepo - composable LLM workflows

scripts.build: npm run build -w @golem-forge/core && npm run build -w @golem-forge/ui-react && npm run build -w @golem-forge/cli
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build -w @golem-forge/chrome
scripts.test: npm run test -w @golem-forge/core && npm run test -w @golem-forge/ui-react && npm run test -w @golem-forge/cli && npm run test -w @golem-forge/chrome
scripts.demo:greeter: npx golem-forge examples/greeter 'Hello, how are you?'
scripts.demo:calculator: npx golem-forge examples/calculator 'What is the 20th Fibonacci number?'
